reviewText: Great Informative Video...Larry Tatum is a Prodigy of Ed Parker.
Master Larry Tatum is THE go to guy on Kenpo

same stuff in his other DVDs its true Larry is a great master with a really good heart with a lot of knowledge and wisdom to give out were not getting it on these DVDs these our introductions to who Larry Tatum is not the art of ken po sorry Larry but i sent all your stuff back its just common seance stuff that's why it works and it really works its what ever marshal arts will come a cross and do wen he looks in to the marshal arts he will come to these same principles the way of the sword our just take your one arm and hand use it like  a sword Larry dose it right he movies and strikes like a shot gun really you can learn from this tape but i just know there is more to Larry then just this
The book has very good pictures and explanations.  The DVD, home movie, was very informative and easy to follow.  Thank you for a great tool!

I bought this DVD thinking it would aid me in my development of American Kenpo Karate I was wrong. This DVD had limited examples, far too short, and it seem as if Larry spent more time being caught up in his ego than teaching the defense system. Moreover when the DVD came in the mail it was a copied version some one put together. This free-stlye DVD was so bad it should have been free$.Save your money this wasn't Larry Tatum's best work.
only 40 min long. shows some fairly useful techniques about 6 total. in hindsight i think its worth 10/15 bucks honestly.

Primero: DISPONIBLE EN ESPAOL!!!!!!!!!

Segundo: Es el nico DVD que conozco que cubre las tcnicas de Free Style de Kenpo Americano.

Larry Tatum hizo un excelente trabajo... 100% recomendable
